text: Henry George Pearce (born 17 September 1917) is a former Australian politician. He was a member of the House of Representatives from 1949 to 1961, representing the Liberal Party in the Division of Capricornia. In 1960, Pearce was made Government Whip in the House of Representatives under Hubert Opperman. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:Australian centenarians Category:Politicians from Queensland Category:1992 deaths Category:Members of the Australian House of Representatives
title: George Pearce
